means: 夸饰文体，美丽辞句，华丽词藻

sentence.Network_en: Cruelty shucks to can ruthless ground the word that people packs meticulously with the euphuism.
sentence.Network_cn: 残酷到能毫不留情地剥去人们用华丽的词藻精心包装的字眼.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(47) - 英霸英语 ... euphroe 收紧器 euphuism 夸饰文体 euphuist 用浮华词者.
理里的作品《尤费伊斯：才智的剖析》（一五七八）在当时非常流行，“绮丽体”（euphuism）这一名词及其形容词从此进入英语语言 …
...悉英国文学史的人，都知道１６世纪的英国散文有一种“优浮绩思体”（Euphuism），句法浮华而对称，讲究双声等等效果，又好使 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Euphues, the name of a character in John Lyly's prose romance of the same name (1578–80), from Greek euphuēs 'well endowed by nature', from eu 'well' + the base of phuē 'growth'

means.word_mean: 1. any artificially elegant style of language
2. an elegant style of prose of the Elizabethan period; characterized by balance and antithesis and alliteration and extended similes with and allusions to nature and mythology
